result.title: SpiralSafe launches Wave Coherence
result.snippet: SpiralSafe's Wave algorithm detects curl and divergence metrics and reports coherence improvements when evidence is added.

result.title: Wave.md: divergence patterns
result.snippet: Wave.md computes curl and divergence on textual fields and recommends adding conclusions to reduce divergence.

result.title: Coherence measurements explained
result.snippet: Practical thresholds are used to flag documents; a "conclusion" section reduces divergence and aids verification.
